1.content: Okay my friends, it begins, now this one is one of those anime I wont do a harem choice, sorry to those who like those. But with that said, here are some choices for you. Also when picking an imperial arms, try making it match the female you're going with here. say, Akame is a weapon based imperial arms.
1.title: Begin

114.content: You are Sasuke Uchiha, the lone survivor of the once mighty Uchiha Clan. Born with the power of Chaos, you have the potential to become the strongest of the Uchiha to ever exist. Ever since you were born, you lived in a world with bandits, assassins, danger beasts, and the Empire itself, though you weren’t raised in the Capitol, far from it. But things would only prove to be a constant struggle for you. At the age of seven, powerful demons ravaged and butchered your clan. It was only due to the combined effort from your mother, father, and your older brother Itachi that they were sealed away. But since that day, you’ve been on your own, seeking revenge no matter the cost. You constantly trained yourself, and 11 years later, you had become very powerful, your hatred continued to drive you to avenge your clan, and revive it finding someone to be at your side. But your hatred had hardened you, and you only desired someone powerful beside you. You had no idea if you would ever find that person, but eventually you traveled to the Capitol to join the Imperial Force, who was your best bet of finding that someone. You happened to be in luck, when a tournament was announced by Esdeath, the Capital’s strongest. You decided to enter to sharpen your skills, seeing the competition, you knew using your weapons on them would be a waste of time, you wouldn’t need them. Despite the reward of winning the tournament would be prized in cash, you didn’t even care about that. You were just hoping to be entertained.
114.title: Chaos Prologue

1141.content:
(You Esdeath Run Kalbi) (http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20141... )

Watching the fighters of the tournament, you weren’t impressed, they were pretty sloppy in their technique, even the one wielding a katana wasn’t that skilled, and that’s something you didn’t think was possible, normally those you’ve experienced with a katana have been refined in their use of it, but not this guy. But you noticed you weren’t the only one who wasn’t impressed, looking up into the shaded part of the stands, Esdeath was bored herself. “So, that’s Esdeath. She is beautiful, but I wouldn’t mind seeing her power for myself.” you thought. Up in the rafters, a member of Esdeath’s team, the Jaegers, was with her discussing the battle. You may not have been able to hear them from this distance, but you could read lips. “What do you think of them?” “Since they’re boring subjects, the battle itself is boring as well. I guess it was expecting too much to expect one capable using an Imperial Arms.” The crowd began to cheer as the sword wielder won. “Oh, it seems they’ve chosen a winner.” The announcer had announced the winner and soon you were called to fight, along with a muscular man. “This next battle is the last match." You stood in the ring, looking at this man and you thought he could at least entertain you. “On the east side…Kalbi the butcher! And on the west side…Sasuke, the wanderer!” The crowd cheered as Esdeath observed you. “It looks like one of them is still a young man, maybe a year or two younger than you.” You looked at the butcher as he towered above you trying to intimidate you. “You’re quite small, aren’t you? Guess I’ll be taking home the prize money!” he said laughing. “I may have been excommunicated, but I’m still a ninth-level master at Koukenji.” You looked at him without even flinching, not a glint of fear in your eyes. “What’s wrong? Too frightened to speak?” “Try to entertain me. Otherwise you will be a waste of my time.” “What?!” The announcer had started the fight not three seconds after that. “Have a full course of my explosive fist!” As he tried to land a punch to you, simply jumping in the air was enough to avoid it, but he did have some impressive strength, you had o give him that much credit. As you descended you landed a kick to him that, even though he blocked it, he was nearly forced out of the ring. This pissed him off and he kept attacking you with speed instead of power, you were easily able to block his attacks, even without your Sharingan. You easily exploited an opening and landed a powerful punch to is stomach, and he really got pissed off. He tried to crush you with both fists, but you easily tripped him with a sweeping kick. As he fell, you jumped up and kicked him in the face, slamming him to the walls outside the ring. Esdeath saw this and was impressed. “That young man is outstandingly talented.” “Yeah.” The announcer called it, proclaiming you the winner, causing the crowd to cheer. And despite the fight being so short, you found enough entertainment to smile, and the instant Esdeath saw that, she had a blush on her face looking at you. “We’ve found him.” “A candidate for an Imperial Arms user, I presume?” “That, as well. But also…” she said walking down towards you. “Commander?” You noticed her approach you, and soon she was about six feet from you. “Sasuke…That’s your name, right? It’s a nice name.” “Thanks.” You looked at her and thought. “I can feel how strong she is now that she’s closer. I have to admit, its almost intimidating.” “Your win just now was magnificent. I’d like to give you a reward.” she said reaching into her shirt and walking towards you. “Thank you very much.” you said trying to give such a warrior some respect. But you were surprised when she put a shackle around your neck with the mark on her chest emblazoned on it. She looked into your eyes and placed a hand on your shoulder. “From now on, you’ll belong to me.” “Wh-What??” She started to pull you along and you fell over in surprise. “It’s too distracting out here. Come to my palace.” She said practically dragging you along. “W-wait, hold on!” “No, I wont wait.” She said yanking the chain and as your head went past her hand, she chopped you in he back of the neck, knocking you out, but before you lost consciousness you thought to yourself. “What the hell just happened??” As you fell she caught you on her shoulder, and she was completely infatuated with you. “Let’s talk in my room, just the two of us.” She said picking you up, and taking you there to be alone. What on earth have you gotten yourself into now?
1141.title: Chaos Begins

11411.content:
(Bols Wave Stylish Seryu Kurome)

About an hour later you started to regain consciousness. As you did, you noticed you were chained to a chair, and there were people standing around you. “Oh, looks like he’s awake.” “Captain, he’s waking up.” You soon felt a hand on your cheek. “Hello, Sasuke. Enjoy your nap?” You looked at her as you loosened your neck muscles a bit. “Nice as it was, I would have preferred if you didn’t knock me out like that.” you said in a way that sounded you were more inconvenienced than anything else. After taking a small look around you could easily but two and two together that these people were the Jaegers. “So, you’re the Jaegers. A pleasure.” Each of them began to introduce themselves to you. “My name’s Wave.” “I’m Bols. It’s a pleasure to meet you.” “I’m Doctor Stylish.” the man in the lab coat said with a flourish. “Seryu Ubiquitous. It’s great to meet you! And this is Coro” she said saluting you, and even the small dog greeted you. “Kurome.” the girl said eating her snacks. “And my name’s Run. It’s nice to make your acquaintance.” he said with a little bow. “Now that you’ve been properly introduced. I have something to say. As you know, I told you all that I came to the Capital that one reason I returned was to fall in love. That said, Sasuke will not only be a backup for the Jaegers, but my lover, as well. Among the members here, do any of you have a spouse or significant other?” To the surprise of a few of you, Bols raised his hand. “Huh?!” “Is that true, Mr. Bols?” “Yep. I’ve been married for six years. She’s so perfect, I cant believe she’s with me!” “Then I must ask, Bols…What should I do in order to capture Sasuke’s heart?” “The trick to capturing your beloved’s heart…Never give up! I, myself, was rejected twice… But I got another chance, and that’s when she finally became mine! Bear in mind that it does take some time.” “Hmm…I see.” she said writing this stuff down. You chuckled a bit, amused by all this. “Esdeath, you flatter me, and I admit you do have qualities I like. But don’t expect me to hand over my heart so easily. Now, if you all wouldn’t mind, I’d back up a bit.” They were confused by your words until you broke your chains, causing a section of it to fly over their heads into a wall. As you stood up, you moved your arms a bit to loosen them up. “Much better.” “Whoa, impressive strength.” “Chains aren’t a problem for me. That said, I have a slight problem with the term ‘backup’ as if I am not strong enough.” “I see. I will have your strength tested tomorrow, but for now, I’d like you to just observe tonight’s first mission for the Jaegers.” “Sounds fair.” Esdeath then explained that the mission was to eliminate a stronghold ran by a bunch of bandits, and that you were all to leave immediately, leaving via horseback. By the time night had fallen, you and the others arrived, but you had to stay back with Esdeath on a small mountain, while the others went to attack. “I still wish I could have went into the fight as well.” you said sitting beside her, watching the team to see what they can do. “Observing their operation will be good for you.” “I see. Very well then.” you said in a stubborn manner, and Esdeath placed her hand on top of yours, blushing a bit, which was unexpected. Just then you heard the alarm from the fortress and watched closely. Apparently Seryu has metal arms that can be changed when her Imperial Arms, Coro bites down on them, and her first weapon was a drill, cutting through the enemy, before changing into a small cannon to destroy the doors. You noticed Stylish moving in that flourished manner, so it was safe to assume he was bragging about creating those weapons. Kurome went in slicing the enemy apart with great speed and skill, Wave wasn’t doing to bad either, backing her up, even though she didn’t need it. Bols used his Imperial Arms flamethrower, Purgatory’s Invitation: Rubicante, to set the whole damn thing ablaze, as Run used his winged Imperial Arms, Thousand-Mile Flight: Mastema, to eliminate any who ran, by firing sharpened feathers through their heads. As they finished, the walked out from the inferno and towards your location. Needless to say you were impressed. “Incredible.” “Sasuke…” You turned your attention towards her. “I shall train you myself. Eventually, you’ll be able to do that much.” You smiled a little towards her. “You’re rather kind.” “Am I different from what you expected? To be honest, this is my first time experiencing these feelings…Being in love. But it isn’t bad.” “I am honored to receive training from you of all people, but do not assume I cannot cause large amounts of destruction myself. I’m stronger than you think. I will prove that much tomorrow.” She smiled at you. “I look forward to seeing your strength. Come, it’s time we returned to the Capital.” She said walking to the rendezvous point with the Jaegers, you following behind, once the team had been reunited, you all returned to the capital.
11411.title: Meet the Jaegers

114111.content:
(Esdeath's outfit from the shower: http://i.imgur.com/6IauqJ3.jpg )

Later that night when you all returned to the palace, you were taken to Esdeath’s room and sat down on the bed while she showered. Needless to say, this was the first time since your clan’s demise you were nervous, not helped by the fact the shower was within your line of sight, the glass door showing her silhouette . “Damn it, how am I nervous? I’ve fought danger beasts, assassins and bandits. Yet I’m almost sweating here. Keep calm Sasuke. Just stay calm.” you thought to yourself. After a few minutes, Esdeath came out of the shower, she was wearing next to nothing. Just a shirt that was short and revealed a good amount of her breasts. Despite JUST getting yourself calm again, you were instantly blushing from the sight of this. “Sorry for making you wait.” “I-it’s fine.” “Would you like a drink?” she said sitting down. “N-no, I’m fine.” you said slightly moving away. She looked over to you. “Hmm? Are you nervous?” “N-No!” you said trying to keep your pride. Esdeath smiled with a blush as well. “You really are a cute one. Well, I‘m not quite sure what to do in this situation, either. But I‘m sure we‘ll figure it out, as long as we know what we want.” You looked at her, and thought for a moment after calming yourself. “Listen, I’d like to ask you something. First off…Esdeath, you like me, correct?” Before you could react, she kissed you full on the lips, and used a little of her strength to force you on your back. Crawling over you a bit. “If I didn’t like you, I wouldn’t be doing this.” You were blushing more from the fact she had stolen your first kiss, and is on top of you. “Th-then I’d like you to hear my request.” “Oh? What is it? Tell me. Say it clearly, so I can hear you.” You looked her straight in the eyes. “As it is now, I hate the capital.” It’s natural for many to people feel that way. What of it?” As she spoke she kept that smile on her face. “If I’m to fight, I refuse to fight for the empire, nor do I wish to join the revolutionary army. I fight for my own reasons. And if the capital and empire get in my way, I will take them apart.” “Sasuke…” In an instant she slapped you, much to your surprise. “What the hell are you thinking, saying that to a general of the capital’s army?” “I realize my words may not be rational, but I have my reasons. If you side with the capital in that moment, then…” Esdeath had stopped your words in their tracks by placing her hand on your other cheek, and licks where she slapped you before wrapping her arms around you. “You don’t have to worry about that. All you have to do is stay here with me.” she then looked you in the eyes. “I understand that you’ve endured a lot in the past. But from now on, I won’t let anything harm you.” She then moved back a little, resting her hands on her lap. “And I won’t take any other lovers. I consider you my only man. And I won’t ever let you feel lonely.” You were extremely surprised at her words, but you looked down, unable to meet her gaze. “I’m happy you feel that way about me, but it’s no good… This isn’t about my happiness, not right now.” Esdeath did have an expression showing worry on her face. “Is it your family? I’ll have them placed under my protection.” “It isn’t that. Look, I have my reasons for fighting, and it is true I want a somewhat peaceful life and environment. To live my life as I see fit, outside the capital. I have a war to fight that concerns the fate of every man, woman and child.” “Sasuke…” “Can you possibly understand that?” “I do not understand. I cannot understand how the weak feel.” You knew she meant ordinary people, but you weren’t happy to hear that. “The universal law is survival of the fittest. The weak are eliminated by natural selection. Those who die are weak.” “Th-Then, if you are going to stand in my way, the love you desire cannot be!” you said standing on the bed. “If you do have feelings for me, I beg you to try to understand!” She looked at you blushing. “Even that expression is nice.” she thought. “However…That won’t happen.” She stood up pointing at you. “Don’t misunderstand our situation! You aren’t the one who will change me. You are the one I shall change. That is the only outcome!” “Just because you want me to, doesn’t mean I’m going to change either! Even if you torture me.” She smiled at you. “Heh, so stubborn” She thought to herself as she looked at you, placing her hands on her chest. “Perhaps that’s exactly why he can smile like that. I want to see that smile again. And those feelings…I want to posses all of him. In that case…” She sat back down on the bed. “Well, I’m sure you’re tired after today. We’ll discuss this again later. For now, let’s rest.” “Huh?” You got off the beat slowly moving to the couch. “I’ll just, sleep on the sofa.” She grabbed your hand. “I won’t do anything tonight, so just sleep in the bed with me.” You knew this one you wouldn’t win. “A-Alright, but I’m going to take a shower first.” you said heading there. “This goes without saying. If you cause a scene within these walls or try to run, it will mean your death. So don’t try anything silly.” You chuckled softly, smiling at her. “It will take more than the troops here to kill me, but I understand.” you said walking to the shower. Once again, that smile of yours got to her, and she placed a hand to her heart. “Th-that smile…” As you showered, she layed back and remembered the words Bols said to her and thought "You'll fall for me, Sasuke. This kind of plan is new and fun." After you cooled off with a shower, you returned to her, and laid down beside her in the bed, getting some rest. The bed was comfortable enough that it was the best sleep you’ve had in quite some time.
114111.title: Desire

1141111.content:
The next morning you woke up to Esdeath using you as a body pillow, and while comforting, caused your face to go bright red before attempting to slip out of her grip, though she held you closer when she woke up. “Good morning Sasuke. Leaving my embrace?” You gulped before jump straight up slipping under her arms and off the bed. “G-Good morning, Esdeath. I was caught off guard, that’s all.” you say trying to calm down before leaving to let her get dressed. As you walked into the main dining room, Wave and Kurome were already there. “Oh, good morning Sasuke. Did you sleep well?” “Morning Wave, Kurome. I admit I did sleep better than I usually do, though I usually sleep in tree’s to enjoy the night.” “Wait, you weren’t hit by danger beasts?” “No. I had my own layer of protection. At any rate, Esdeath sort of used me as a body pillow, which did catch me off guard.” Wave chuckled a little “I can imagine. Kurome, isn’t it a little early for snacks?” “Mind your own business.” “If you had more seafood, it’d be better for you.” “Then I’d stink like the ocean, like you.” Wave was surprised by that remark. After a few minutes, Wave even pointing out the girl Akame from the wanted posters looks like Kurome telling you both she’s her sister, who she wants to kill because she loves her, Esdeath walked in. “Sasuke, we’re heading to Mount Fake. We’ll be hunting for the next few days.” “Mount Fake huh? Alright then.” “Wave and Kurome, you’ll be joining us. We’ll hunt danger beasts, while keeping an eye out for enemies.” They both nodded. “Kurome and I will take the east side until dusk. Wave and Sasuke will scout the west side. In the evening, we’ll switch. And Sasuke will be with me.” You raised an eyebrow wondering what she was planning. “Upper-level Danger Beasts appear at night. It will be a good chance to impress him.” she thought to herself.

Out at Mount Fake, you and wave were walking before he started up the conversation. “I couldn’t say this back at the palace, but you sure have it rough. If you ever want to talk, I’ll listen.” You turned to look at him. “Thank you. But I should be okay. I’ve dealt with worse before.” “Well we do have some similarities.” “Oh? How so?” “How should I put this? We’ve seemed to have faced our fair share of hardships. And let’s just say I’ve met some real oddballs.” “No I get it. Trust me.” “Anyway, since we’re so similar, I’m sure we’ll get along-” He saw you slowly drawing your blade. “Sasuke?” “Duck!” you said charging at him. He did so and you sliced some kind of tree beast in half. But doing so summoned a great number of them. “Thank you, Sasuke.” “No problem. Stand back.” you said taking a big inhale, and when you exhaled you let out a huge stream of fire. Wave’s jaw dropped when he saw this be he started to fight with you. And he did notice a few elements that you used were Lightning, Fire, and Wind. At the end of it, you put your blade away and he turned to you. “You’re strong, Sasuke.” “Thanks. Though for your safety, I was holding back.” He was shocked as hell to hear you were holding back. “Well either way, I do owe you for saving my life back there.” he said walking forward. After a few minutes of walking you sensed something off, and it was very evil. “Wave hold on.” “What is it?” “I sense something…” Wave looked around. “But we’re at one of the highest vantage points, the only ones here could be either us or Danger beasts.” He started to move forward but as he did, you figured out what was up and you saw he was about to get caught in something sinister. “Wave, move!” you said grabbing him and while spinning a bit threw him a bit further back on the trail. In that moment some kind of demonic seal encircled you and began to cause you massive pain, and drain your energy. “Sasuke!” “Stay back Wave! This seal is meant for me!” “What’s happening?!” “This thing was designed to subdue and drain my power to where I would die. But I can dispel it! Though I might end up knocked somewhere away from here. If we get separated, tell Esdeath I will be at the summit!” You said as you plunged you Chidori charged sword into the seal, and as you expected the reaction was a powerful explosion that sent you flying. Wave was instantly sweating in fear for what he had to tell Esdeath. And when they met up, they returned to the capital. After Wave was punished, having stone blocks dropped on his kneeling knees, he told her the strength he saw you have. Esdeath knew you could have easily survived that explosion, and vowed she would see you again.
1141111.title: Seperation

11411111.content: Thanks to that explosion, you ended up crash landing in a forest about 50 miles from Mount Fake, only regaining consciousness that night. You from what you could tell you weren’t that injured, just a couple cracked ribs. “Damn, that’s gonna take a couple days to heal up.” you said to yourself. But unlike you however, your sword was much worse off. It was severely damaged and cracked. “My sword, judging from this much damage. I’d say its got enough strength for one last attack.” You think back to how many battles you have won with that sword, and while it was only a weapon to some, it was like a partner to you. “I must choose your final victim wisely old friend.” you said putting the blade away. "Seems like it’s time…I use that blade…” you thought to yourself. But for now you had to made do with your ninja gear, unfortunately the explosion somehow temporarily disabled your summoning ability, so you were going to have to go on foot. "Great, I can't even summon a ride. Oh well." you said as you started walking, but you were already sensing enemies around you. “Seems the fun never ends.” In a moment’s notice you were attacked by assassins once again. One even binding your arm with a whip of some kind. “A whip? Really now? I admit it can be useful if you bind an opponent. However…” you said grabbing the whip and yanking it hard, forcing the guy to fly toward you, only to be greeted with a strong roundhouse kick to the head. “Weapons like that wont work on me.” You took the whip handle to use it for your own, and with one quick movement you wrapped it around one of the attacker’s leg and pulled on it so hard he did a back flip as the whip unwound from the leg at the right moment. Another attacker tried to attack with a poison blade and you used a kunai to block it. “Not bad. One cut from that I’d be dead.” You landed a kick to his stomach which sent him staggering back before throwing the kunai, right into the center of his head, causing an instant death. As the one who first attacked tried reclaiming his whip, you kicked him into the air over a tree branch. But using his whip you caught his neck and as he fell, the whip got caught on the branch and it snapped his neck. And to kill the last one, you pulled out a large Demon Wind Shuriken and it sliced right through him, and you caught it as it returned. “That takes care of you fools. Now to head to mount fake.” you said as you started walking. As you continued to approach Mount Fake, you continued to think about what that demon seal was doing out there in the first place. “Things just don’t add up. Ever since I arrived at the palace, I felt a darkness that I can’t quite place, and then there’s that demonic seal…what the hell is going on at the capital? For now I can’t worry about that, I have to get to Mount Fake, and fast.” you thought as you picked up the pace. Every now and again you would encounter danger beasts, using your powers to kill them quickly. However, when you cam across an evil-bird, you decided to kill it with a kunai to the heart, before using your flames to cook it. Evil-birds were a delicious delicacy that were around your old home, and Itachi taught you how to hunt and kill them, and while you weren’t able to make different foods with them like your mother showed you, you were just fine eating them as they are. After that meal, you decided to place a protective barrier around you before resting for the night, saving some of the evil-bird for breakfast. Before you fell asleep, you thought to yourself “No matter what happens…I will restore my clan..”
11411111.title: Forest Survival.

114111111.content:
(Najenda) (Dragon: http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121... )

The next day, you woke up around mid afternoon due to all the effort last night. Once you did a little stretching and ate the remains of the evil-bird. You once again started to make your way to the mountain. But as you were nearing your goal, you had sensed something to the east, and it felt unnatural. “The hell? That doesn’t feel friendly. Despite my need to get to Mount Fake, I need to find out what’s causing this feeling.” you thought to yourself as you made your way to that location. Avoiding enemies and Danger Beasts along the way, you found yourself at some kind of ravine during the night. “You’ve got to be kidding me.” Looking across it, you saw some kind of base in the mountains. And you could tell there was something going on. “I’ve got to get over there. Maybe…” You bit your hand and focused your energy into your hand. “Summoning Jutsu!” you said as you slammed your hand on the ground. A large cloud of smoke came from that point and when it cleared a large black wyvern had appeared from that spot. “Seems I got my summoning ability back.” you said jumping onto the dragons back. “Let’s go.” The dragon took flight across the ravine and you could see some people in need of help. They were surrounded by things that you could tell were once ordinary people. “What the hell are those things. No matter. I will help these guys out.” You said as the dragon dived to them before you jumped off its back and landing a powerful punch to one of the attacker’s faces. “Stay down, you abomination.” You turned to the people behind you and you noticed one of them was Akame. “You guy’s are Night Raid huh? Well, I have no reason to fight any of you. So I’m going to give you a hand.” In that moment, the leader of Night Raid, Najenda, came in on the back of an Air Manta, along with two other people. One jumping off the creature at high altitude and landing without a scratch. Using your Sharingan you could tell he was an organism-based Imperial Arms. “Now, eliminate all enemies before you, Susanoo.” she said on the back of the manta. A few of them charged at him, but you also took some out with a pair of demon wind shuriken. “Don’t forget, I’m your enemy too, freaks.” The small army seemed to try taking you both out at the same time. And you led your half away from the others. Each time you threw your shuriken, you used the element of earth to impale them on crystal spikes. “You’re no match for me!” As you fought, you couldn’t help but wonder who was coordinating the attack. Though for the moment you stuck to killing these soldiers. However, you were surprised when you got a closer look at the corpses of the enemy. “Shit!” you whistled and the dragon came back and while still in flight, you jumped to its back before the bodies exploded. Luckily, Susanoo was an Imperial Arms, so as long as his core was intact, he could regenerate. “That was way too close…Now who’s causing this attack?” You said looking with your sharingan. After a moment, you found the attacker: Doctor Stylish. “Doctor!” you yelled as the dragon accelerated toward him, Najenda also following suit with the air manta. Both you and Susanoo kept him form escaping. “So I have you to thank for those freaks. Humans aren’t your personal lab rats!” He looked at the two of you and he pulled out some kind of syringe and injected himself. “It’s such a shame Sasuke. You were good with the General, and at the very least I was hoping to make you a test subject, but I will have to make due with killing you!” he said as his body began to mutate and grow. “Here it comes! This is the ultimate in stylishness! I become a Danger Beast myself, and destroy all of you!” While two of his subordinates admired this, he grabbed them in his massive hands. “You are my precious nourishment! Let‘s become one!” he said as a mouth appeared across his abdominal area, devouring them both. The third tried to run, but like the others she was captured and devoured. “Yes! I eat this nutritious meat, and I level up!!” He ended up growing to massive size, his true body on the center of his forehead, but with the way the creature’s body was built, it wouldn’t be simple to hit. Half of the thing was made of metal for one thing, and you could tell it’s skin was extremely tough. “I’m still not big enough. I’m not close enough to being the ultimate Imperial Arms… To go higher, I have to get even bigger! For that, I will have you too!” he said trying to reach at you and Susanoo. You were both able to dodge, Susanoo trying to attack his metal arm, but despite his power, he couldn’t damage it. But you took to the skies with your dragon to find a way to hit that weak spot. As Susanoo kept dodging, Stylish started to laugh. “What’s wrong, Organism-based Imperial Arms? You can hit harder!” “How about this!?” In that moment he felt a powerful blast hit his back, and you instantly got his attention. “One thing you should know Doctor, never turn your back on a dragon!” With his attention divided between you and Susanoo, the Night Raid member who wears the Incursio armor got Akame close enough to him, and with the two working together, they tried to hit him with the Murasame Imperial Arms, a sword who could kill anyone with one cut, but his skin was too tough. “It’s no use! If it can’t cut my skin, even the Ichizan Hissatsu: Murasame is useless.” Akame kept her eye on Stylish. “Time for you to give up!” But he got caught off guard by the long-range imperial arms: Pumpkin, which was a powerful gun that had multiple options. “You…” “You’re distracted!” Stylish looked up and saw you plummet at him and you sent a massive amount of your lightning energy into your sword and sliced off his metal arm before the sniper of Night Raid, Mine, fired another shot, forcing him down. With the combined efforts of yourself and Night Raid, Doctor Stylish was dead as dust. Your sword shattered at that moment, and you were left holding the hilt. “Good-bye, partner.” you said to yourself, bidding your sword farewell. The members of Night Raid thanked you and you bowed in respect before using the dragon to head back to Mount Fake.
114111111.title: Stylish Battle

1141111111.content:
(Soldier: http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/yugi...)

As the evening approached, you could see you were getting closer to the mountain. As you were getting closer, you couldn’t help but think of how things have gotten more chaotic than usual. But your thoughts were interrupted as the dragon growled, sensing something. “What is it boy?” In an instant, something blasted some dark energy at you and your dragon, the two of you just barely dodged it. “What the hell?” The blasts kept coming and eventually your dragon was hit, forcing it to roar in pain. “Red-Eyes, no!” The two of you crash landed onto the mountain, and your dragon returning to the world you summoned it from. “Ugh…Who the hell is attacking me?” You noticed a figure in a cloak, his face concealed so you couldn’t identify him. He radiated with demonic energy. “Hello, Sasuke.” You quickly got on your feet and got ready to defend yourself. “How do you know my name?” “It’s hard not to know an Uchiha, especially when it’s one who summons a dragon like that. Who else could?” “Who are you?” “You will find out in time boy, but for now, I shall leave you with these.” he said as he snapped his fingers. In that moment, a few demons in armor showed up, and they looked strong. “Demons…You’re with the one’s who slaughtered my clan!” “Correct. We will meet again, if you survive them that is.” he said as he walked away. “Get back here!” you yelled charging in, but in that moment you almost got your head sliced off by one of the soldiers, and even though you managed to avoid it, the man in the cloak had vanished. “Damn it!” The soldiers rushed to you to cut you down. “Get out of my way!” you yelled as you let out a HUGE blast of flame, amazingly, they managed to avoid the attack, though you had melted a bit of the rocks. “Well, this should be entertaining at least.” you said charging in, using your shadow clone technique to make two more of you. Each one of you taking one on alone, but these things were strong. And what’s worse, without that sword of yours, they way these things are leaning into you, you couldn’t hit them hard enough to end this quickly. “Damn these things are good.” As one tried to bring it’s sword down on you, you managed to catch the blade between your hands. But as soon as you did, the creatures sent their own dark energy into them, and they caused you great pain. “Agh! Damn you!” You sent lightning into your hands and the two energies clashed, and a huge blast wave came from that point and sent you both apart, you did manage to destroy his sword however, which was good. Your clones did the same thing, even though the blast wave did destroy them in turn. You knew on this terrain you had a disadvantage, so you decided to get to the top as fast as you could. Luckily up there, the area was nice, flat, and level. The three creatures had jumped onto the summit as well and you looked at them, sharingan ablaze in your eyes. “I have to end this quickly. Otherwise they would end up overwhelming me.” Two of them charged at you at the same time, and using your martial arts you were able to knock them back. They each tried to kill without a hint of relent or hesitation. The more they did this the more you were getting pissed and you sent a great deal of lightning into your hand. “Enough of this!” you said as you struck one in the chest, even extending that Chidori into the Chidori Spear, and changing it up a bit you made sure he died by having the lightning spike out of him, but one more came from behind and as you quickly called back your attack and you landed a kick to its stomach, forcing it off the summit. You had the chance to fight one of the remaining two alone, and you didn’t waste this opportunity. You charged for him and you called on the power of wind to form a blade around your hand, the speed of it was so great it would either slice clean through, or tear him apart. The demon tried to end it with a strike to the heart, but you managed to knock his hand away and forced your wind blade into his chest, and the instant you did, the chest area was torn apart, killing him in one blow. “Two down, one to go.” You said as the third and final soldier returned. “Time to end this!” you said charging at him. As you charged at him, you increased your speed and tackled him off the summit, both of you began to fall. “I’ve had enough of you!” Your hand began to glow a purple color and you grabbed its face. “Eat this!” Darkness Finger!” In that moment a great amount of shadow energy came from your hand, but because you kept your grip on his face, the energy went into him as you both crashed onto a path lower on the mountain, and you kept up the attack as you pushed his head into the mountain. Your energy went right through his head and when you let go, his body turned to dust. “Good riddance.” you said painting a bit. You were pretty exhausted from the fight and you once again made your way to the summit. You took a minute to catch your breath but something crash landed behind you. As you turned your head, you heard a very familiar voice speak, and you knew who it was. Esdeath managed to show up thinking you were an enemy, and apparently she was using a Danger Beast she tamed to get into the skies. “You will have to deal with me.” she said drawing her sword and pointing it at you. “I’ll test out my new torture method- Eh?” she said interrupted when she saw it was you, a blush appearing on her face. “Sasuke…” You thought to yourself “On top of everything else, Esdeath shows up now?? Well, at least this time it’s an ally who popped up.” But just as you thought that, you noticed Danger Beasts that felt human began to approach you. “Wait, are these more of the Doctor’s experiments?” you thought. Before things could escalate into another fight, Esdeath sliced them into pieces before you could react. She even noticed one of the trying to crawl toward her, but she forced her heel into the creatures brain. “Don’t get in my way.” She turned toward you and you thought she would end up striking you as well, but with that same blush she smiled at you and said “So this isn’t a dream…I’ve been looking forward to the day we’d be reunited, Sasuke.” You weren’t sure weather to be afraid or relieved at this point, especially with that thing still alive with her heel in it’s brain. “Why not put that thing out of it’s misery?” you thought. Things definitely not getting dull around here.
1141111111.title: Reunion

11411111111.content:
(Syura)

Before you could even question anything, Esdeath had you in her embrace. “Undoubtedly, this is Sasuke’s scent. You’re the real thing. How dare you leave me? I was lonely.” “I couldn’t exactly control an explosion that propelled me into the forest, you know. Why are you here?” “Lately, I’ve been exterminating Danger Beasts harassing the capital. How long have you been here?” “I just got here before you dropped in.” you said before you got out of her embrace. “During the time, I fought Danger Beasts and assassins to get here. Though that explosion from earlier damaged my sword to the point it could only handle one more attack.” She walked over to you and began to gently feel your body. “I see…Your physique has certainly become more pronounced. And you’ve clearly gotten stronger.” She then began to stroke your head in praise. “You’ve done well in such a short amount of time! Surely, you’ll continue to grow even stronger!” “Uh, thanks.” You got your thoughts together and thought “What am I doing? I can’t be buttered up like this!” “The Danger Beasts here are pretty much annihilated. They were annoying but…” she said as she held you close to her again. “Thanks to them, I was able to find you. This can only be destiny.” But that moment was quickly brought to a halt when you both sensed someone’s presence. “There’s a surprising number of nuisances around here. The one that just hid…”she said clearly speaking to the enemy. "I know you’re there. Come out. If you do not, I shall not hesitate on attacking.” she said drawing her sword and pointing it at the enemy, who walks out form behind a boulder. “I thought I hid pretty well. But I gotta give it to you. As expected from the capital’s strongest. Still, to encounter you out here…I guess playtime‘s over.” The enemy said as he stood before you both. While he too wore a cloak to conceal himself, he was clearly human, and the cloak itself was different. “Seems as though you know why the Danger Beasts are everywhere. I’ll escort you to the torture room.” “Unfortunately, I’m not into that.” he said with a slight chuckle. “And ultimately, I’ll have you clean up a big toy! Imperial Arms Shambala! Activate!” A ring of purple flame surrounded you two as a Yin-Yang appeared under you, this whole thing seemed to be some kind of seal, but not the kind you know. “What’s happening?” In a bright flash of light you two were transported somewhere else. The next thing you know, you were both on some tropical island. “What the hell is going on?!” You thought for a second after calming down. “Esdeath, I need you to hurt me.” “Sasuke…To think you had such a fetish. Just as I thought, we really are meant for each other.” she said blushing. “That is not what I meant! Because of that guy, this all may be an illusion! So if we feel some physical pain, we might wake up.” “Alright. Here goes.” You braced yourself but instead of pain, you felt Esdeath kiss you full on the lips. And this was definitely not an illusion. She walked away a little, putting space between the two of you. “It isn’t an illusion. The sensations are too real. The smell of salt and the ocean breeze…temperature and humidity. This is probably all real.” “Which means…” “Most likely, it’s that guys ability. Have we been teleported somewhere else?” “An Imperial Arms that can manipulate time and space? Impressive.” “Manipulating time and space is a superior ability. Definitely in the top percentile among the Imperial Arms. Just who is he?” she thought. “For now, let’s check our surroundings.” she said as she placed her hand on the ground and created a massive pillar of ice, the speed it rose from the ground was incredible and you were forced to one knee. “We’re completely surrounded by ocean.” Esdeath was silent for a moment. “This is a beautiful view. It’s as though we’re on a date.” “You sure are calm.” you said still kneeling. “The ability of the Imperial Arms surpasses the imagination. If you want to go on, you have to keep an open mind.” “I see.” “Back to the main subject…” before you could react, she was embracing you again. “It’s as though we’re on a date!” “W-Wait a second!” just then a huge danger beast that seemed to be the same as Doctor Stylish when he transformed rose form the sea, it was almost exactly the same, except this one was decayed. “A giant Danger Beast.” “That thing is as big as Stylish was. It took me and all of Night Raid to kill it last time. Can just two of us do it?” you thought to yourself. The beast charged at the pillar ready to kill. “Here it comes!” “I have no mercy for nuisances.” she said as she summoned a great number of ice shards in the air, all aimed at the Danger Beast. “Something like you deserves skewering! Weiss Schnabel!” she said firing the ice right at it. And even though it was forced down as it was hit, it still managed to rise. “You’re tougher than I thought. This is becoming exciting.” “Esdeath, that spot on his forehead, that looks like a weak spot.” “Hmm, my thoughts exactly.” she said touching the pillar with her hand. “We really are meant for each other. Grau Horn!” she yelled as a massive spike of ice extended from the pillar right at the beasts head, but it did manage to dodge it just by moving its head. “How tenacious.” You charged forward with your Chidori, running along the spike. “Sasuke!” You jumped right into the weak spot “Eat this!“ you yelled as you struck it with your Chidori and killing it, the body crashing to the ground. “Magnificent. I wanted to charm you by showing off…But to think you’d charm me even more. I even called out my special move…” she said watching you. But then a smaller beast grabbed the tower and cracked it, causing it to break. “There’s still more?” “Leave it to me. I’ll give it a fitting death.” she said sliding on the broken spike before jumping off it. With just a snap of her fingers, she created a HUGE sphere of ice, sending it to the Danger Beast. “Hagel Sprung!” she called out as the sphere hit its target, crushing it with little effort. You just looked up at her standing on the sphere in victory and thought “What an impressive fighting style…So this is the true strength of the capital‘s strongest.. She’s…incredible.” The two of you regrouped in the shade as she was supposedly taking some notes, when in reality, she was drawing. “It seems there were only two of them.” “So that’s what he meant by cleaning up toys. And it seems this was the hiding place for a new type of Danger Beast.” “After we’ve rested, what then?” “First, we’ll investigate our surroundings. We must gain an understanding of our environment.” “That’s true.” “Panicking would be fatal. We’ll stay calm while venturing out.” “Fine by me.” She smiled as she drew, and thought to herself “Hmm…it doesn’t look like him.” She was drawing the two of you together. For the rest of that day, you both explored the island. Gathering food, drinking water, hunting and even taking in the island's beauty and wildlife. She decided to have some fun by putting a rafflesia flower on your head, which you shook off quickly in embarrassment, but you were happy to see her having fun, and admittedly, you were having a great time too. Something you haven’t had in a long, long time.
11411111111.title: Island Isolation

114111111111.content:
(Itachi, young you)

The two of you had explored the island over the course of the day, and soon you were both sitting on the beach as it turned dark. “Exploring the area took all day. It’s already dark.” Esdeath held your hand. “But it was quite fun!” she said with a smile. You chuckled a bit and nodded. “Yeah.” You sat there in silence for a moment. “And I now know this island’s location.” “Huh?” “This is a deserted island to the far southeast of the capital.” “The far southeast? We were teleported that far huh?” “Basically, we are the only ones on this island. So, what would you like to do, Sasuke? It’s your destiny, so you choose.” “As much as I would like a vacation, there’s some things I need to take care of first.” “How boring.” she said standing up. “How are you so composed?” “It’s because I have an idea of how we can get back. Don’t worry.” “I see.” “However, I need you to do your part too. Got it?” she said walking away. “Yeah.” you said following her. The two of you made your way back to where you originally arrived onto the island, and there was a purple spot glowing in the sand. “As I thought. There was a clue hidden where we first teleported.” “Does this mean he can only teleport to places he’s marked like this?” “Judging from the area he activated when moving us, it seems he can only move a few people at once. And that he uses a tremendous amount of energy to do so. He probably can’t keep doing it.” “Which means, if we watch over this spot…” “The gate may open eventually. That’s one way to get back. Now, before we talk about the more likely way to return…” “Huh?” She quickly hugged you and forced your face into her chest. “Since it’s just the two of us here, let’s get to know one another better!” You quickly pulled back and fell. “T-Time out! H-How about we get to know each other in a different way?” She crawled over you a little. “Would you like me to stop? Then tell me your story. First, where did you learn to wield a sword?” “I was taught by my brother and various members of my clan. It’s also how I learned to use all the tools at my disposal, to call on my sharingan and own powers, or at least how to use them.” “I see, and how can you use lightning?” “I-I was born with incredible powers, Esdeath. I can control Earth, Fire, Wind, Water, Darkness, Lightning, and Ice. Though I’m not as skilled with ice as you are.” “To actually learn and control all that, you are incredible.” “You seem like you can do about anything as well.” “Not quite. I don’t really take to the fine arts. When one of my subordinates would play his flute, I had no idea what was good about it at first. But tell me, why have you not mentioned your clan until now?” You were surprised by that question, but you decided to flip one on her. “Before I answer that. I have a few things to ask you as well.” “Alright.” “You weren’t born in the capital were you?” “That’s right. I’m from the northern border. Have you ever heard of the Paltas Clan?” “I think I heard about them from my brother once. They’re said to be amazing hunters.” “That’s right. I grew up as the chief’s daughter.” She began to tell you her history, how she got her attitude of how the strong and the weak survived and even how she’s the last of her clan as well. You were surprised to hear how that was a fact you had in common. “I see. Then, I’d like to see what your Imperial Arms looks like.” “Oh, that? My Imperial Arms is here.” she said taking your hand and placing a finger to the mark on her chest. She then explained how her power was obtained when she drank an urn of the blood of a Danger Beast that controlled ice. She even told you how those before her who tried it went insane, but she was so dominant she tamed the power in moments. “So, you told me you would tell me why you never brought up your clan until now.” You gently got her off you, and walked to the edge of the beach. “Like you, my clan is gone. I’m all that’s left. But they were destroyed by something far worse than any human, imperial arms, or Danger Beast.” “What do you mean?” You looked at the moon telling your story. “11 years ago, my clan was at its peak. Itachi, my older brother was training me that I would inherit the Uchiha’s Murasama, a blade passed down through the clan, the strongest warrior being able to wield it. However… that’s when it happened.”

-Flashback-

“Demons began to attack the Uchiha clan, and despite the efforts of all our warriors, even the old tried to fight. But each one was put down by the demons. As this was happening, my brother had taken me to a small room beneath my house.” Itachi set you and the Murasama down before he placed some seals on the walls. “Sasuke, stay here. Do not leave this room until the seals release, do you hear me?” “But what about you?” “I’ll be fine. Just stay here.” he said leaving you in the room. Hours passed before the seals were broken. When that happened, you climbed out of the secret room and looked around, your house pretty damaged. “Big brother? Mother? Father?” You walked out of your house and you were horrified by what you saw. The bodies of your fellow Uchiha littered throughout, the blood all over the place. You about puked but sucked it up, and went looking for your family. After a few minutes of searching, you found them, but you were so shocked as to what you saw, you dropped the sword. Your mother and father were both dead, and Itachi was barely alive. “Big brother!” you said picking up the blade and running to him, you were dragging the sword by the handle and the scabbard slid off. “Sasuke…” “Please Itachi, you have to live!” “Sasuke…Listen, beware the capital, and the demons will return one day…I know you will be strong in time. Try to find…someone to make you happy…” “Big brother, you’re gonna be okay, you can make it!” He slowly reached out to you with one hand, and gently jabbed you in the forehead. “I-I’m sorry, Sasuke…” In that moment, his hand dropped and you looked at him in silence, processing this. “In that moment, I lost all control of my emotions, and as if responding to the mixture of fear, rage, agony, and sorrow, the Murasama began to shine and every last drop of blood that belonged to my dead clan members were drawn into the blade. The color had changed and power surged through it. But at that age, I couldn’t use it. I put the sword in its scabbard, and placed it in a secret storage base my clan used, in case I need it again.”

-Present-

“I swore revenge, and to destroy those demons. I know Itachi meant someone high up in the capital summoned those demons. And I even remember someone from the capital visiting my clan the day before. I just cant remember the face.” “I see…” “You may think they died because they were weak…but these demons are stronger than you know. And when I find them, and the one who did this, I will kill them! And if you wont help me, then you can get out of my way!” Esdeath was silent for a moment, before embracing you close to her. “Sasuke. I told you I wouldn’t let you feel alone. I will stay with you no matter what. I’ll help you get yoru revenge.” “E-Esdeath…” You felt touched, and while you asked her how else you got back to the capital, you stayed in her embrace. “We need to tame a Danger Beast that can fly, and ride it back.” “Leave that to me.” You said as you bit your thumb and walking forward. You summoned the same dragon from last time and got on its back. “Coming Esdeath?” “So you can summon dragons?” “Among other things.” “I see. You truly are amazing Sasuke.” she said getting on, as the two of you flew back to the capital, you couldn’t help but think to yourself “This feeling in my chest…I-is this…Love?” You may not have known it, but you may have been falling for Esdeath now.
114111111111.title: Tale of Vengeance

1141111111111.content:
(The sword: http://snakehead333.deviantart.com/art/H...) (visual effects, 5 minutes into this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gnC45qt8...) (Further details 3:44-4:35; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PZHIXnDs...)

After an entire day of flying, you and Esdeath had finally retuned to the capital, your dragon even landing in the main yard. “I admit, that was a nice flight.” she said jumping off. “I agree.” You jumped off as well and stroked your dragon’s snout. “Thank you my friend. Take your rest.” The dragon then returned to the world it’s summoned from before stretching a bit. “Esdeath listen, before I ask a favor, I need to make a stop. I need that sword I told you about.” “I see. Do you need a horse?” “No, I can get there by foot.” “Alright. But make sure you return to me soon.” You chuckled a little and smiled at her. “I will.” You started to move across rooftops to get out of the capital faster, soon making your way deep to the forest and into the mountains., and you found an area that is rather secluded. Using your energy, you placed your hand on a certain boulder that opened up a secret passage into the mountain itself. You walked deep into the mountain and saw your blade as you placed it long ago. Even without drawing the blade, you could feel the incredible power within. You grabbed the scabbard and placed it at your side, even placing your hand on the scabbard with your finger on the trigger, to make sure you get used to the feel of it. “This is the first time I’ve had my finger on any kind of trigger. An odd feeling, but I know this will come in handy.” you said to yourself. You knew that you would need to train with this blade to get used to its strength. With your new blade, you returned to the capital, and you walked to where the Jaegers meet. What’s more, you noticed a big meal already set out, and the others smiled welcoming you back. “Wow, I didn’t expect this kind of reception.” “You’re our comrade Sasuke. We always welcome back one of our own after something like this happens.” “And if it weren’t for me, you wouldn’t have been caught in that trap.” “Relax Wave. You had nothing to do with it. But I do appreciate this, my friends.” you said smiling. “Come, Let’s celebrate Sasuke’s return.” “Right, Captain!” With a smile on your face, you had decided to relax for once, and enjoyed the feast that Bols and the others cooked up. Wave knew his way around seafood, so the sushi was amazing. Bols made some great soups, salad, and with Seryu’s help, made some good chicken as well. On top of that, you even met the wife and daughter Bols had talked about before. You were amazed to see how love could find someone who has done what Bols has done, showing that you and Esdeath could easily could be together. The Jaegers had truly become like a family to you. Kurome even gave you one of her cookies, and you gladly accepted it. You sat with Esdeath during most of this, and you were happy around her. After the party, you decided to help clean up, and got to know the team better. After a while though, you had remembered you needed to train, and later on you gathered the Jaegers together, Esdeath included.. “Listen, I need your help.” “What is it Sasuke?” “I have a new blade that I need to test out. But the only one’s I know I can use this on in training without killing someone are all of you. As such I request your help. I have a location we can train in without holding back. You guys up for it?” They looked at each other and thought about it for a minute. “I don’t mind.” “I'm fine with it." “If it helps preserve justice, let’s do it!” “It’s the least I could do.” “Alright.” “Do you wish for me to fight with them?” “No. I need to train against the others first, then I shall face you one on one..” “Very Well. Where is this location?” “I will take you there now. Follow me.” you said walking outside. As the others follow you, you concentrate your power and used your power of Chaos Control to open up an entirely different dimension, dragging you and the others in. The area was like no other. Platforms of rock were everywhere, yet there were rocks, trees, mountains and other objects to use for cover and defense. “Where are we?” “This is my Chaos Dimension. A place I use for intense training. Here we could go all out without anyone or anything getting destroyed.” On top of that, the way I have things set up, instead of taking a lethal blow, you will be forced out of the battle, and have to observe it. with that said... You said jumping to one of the floating platforms. “I want you all to come at me with the intent to kill.” A platform moved to Esdeath and she jumped on, taking the role as a spectator this time. “Very well.” Coro grew to massive size when she said this. Wave had called on his Imperial Arms, Grand Chariot to prepare for battle as well. And you slowly drew your blade, which glowed an ominous crimson color and surged with power. “Let’s get started.”
1141111111111.title: A Welcome Return

11411111111111.content: The instant you told them to get started, Bols had fired off his imperial arms and a great stream of flame rushed to destroy you, however you decided to test your weapon and you blocked the flames with your blade, forcing it to go off in two different directions. In surprise, he let go of the trigger, but some of the flames flowed around your blade and you thought to yourself “Oh now things are going to be good.” You charged in at great speeds, but before you could land a blow, Kurome blocked your sword, canceling the flames, and Bols moved to another platform as you and Kurome kept clashing blades. “Impressive skills, but don’t I’m as easy to kill as the others you’ve faced.” you said as you kept leaning into her, and she kept getting forced back to the point she was at the edge of the platform. Wave charged in as you attempted to force her off, you let out a huge burst of wind that forced them both back, each landing onto another platform. “He’s good.” “No wonder Esdeath has taken a liking to him.” Esdeath just watched intrigued, even sitting on the edge of the platform she’s on. “Impressive Sasuke. Show me what you can do.” Without warning Coro came in like a bullet to try and tear you apart, and you just sliced him down the middle, but before you could move on, Seryu charged in with a sword arm and you just barely dodged it, it even took a couple strands of hair off you. “That was close.” you thought as Coro started to regenerate. Run provided some cover fire for the others as he fired a barrage of some kind of steel feathers, it took quite a bit of speed to deflect them all. “So this is what you guys can do. Alright then, no more holding back!” you vanished from their sight for a second and slash at Bols, but as you had assured them, he was forced to another spectator platform. “What speed. He was holding back until now?” Kurome came in with some of her puppets, and you were slightly overwhelmed at first, but you called on the power of earth to create two pillars of earth that rise in a diagonal direction to get her puppets out of the way. The two of you kept going at if for several minutes and the instant you saw an opening, you kicked her so hard she went into the air and by focusing energy into the blade, you managed to create an energy slash with a single swing. Not only did it send Kurome into the spectator area, but it did slice multiple platforms in half. “This sword is incredible…It can amplify the energy and elements I pour into it.” you thought. Run kept firing at you as you put your sword away. “I won’t be able to do much as he keeps going like this. I need to force him to the ground.” you thought as you tried to gather up your energy. You called on a great amount of wind and focused it into your hand. Once you got the power your needed, you charged right for him. He fired off another of those feathers, and you retaliated with a compressed bullet of wind, about the size of your fist. The instant the feather made contact, the bullet released so much wind it was on par with a massive hurricane. Coro was barely holding onto the ground of a platform using his body as a shield to keep Seryu from flying off. Wave just ended up slammed into a boulder, but still stayed in the fight. Run on the other hand was forced into the ground. The instant this happened, you struck him with your Chidori, and forced him out of the fight. “Three down, three to go.” you looked at Coro, Seryu, and Wave. “Who’s next?” Esdeath watched you and thought “Sasuke, you’re so strong. As I thought. You are my destiny.” Coro then equipped Seryu with multiple long range weapons, and you knew this could get ugly. She fired off a hail fire of attacks. And you could just barely avoid it. “Not bad Seryu. I can tell Stylish gave you quite the arsenal. But it isn’t going to be enough!” you said getting closer and closer. But she fired on the platform you were about to land on, and while the blast didn’t hit you, it obscured your vision. “Damn it.” Just then she pierced the smoke charging in, this time with her drill arm. On instinct, you let out a huge amount of lightning with Chidori Stream, sending her back. With the very small opening you had. You threw your sword at her, and it pierced her, forcing her and Coro to the spectator area, the sword sticking into a boulder, but it damn near went through it. “Now it’s just you and me Wave.” you said jumping to the platform and grabbing your sword. Getting it out was simple, as you pulled it out, you sliced the boulder down the middle, and like the pierced area of the boulder, the cut was smooth as marble. “Amazing.” you said as you put your blade away. “I’m going to fight you with my bare hands this time Wave. Come at me.” “Alright Sasuke, here I come!” he said charging in, throwing a powerful punch. You easily caught it and the two of you began to exchange blows. Each managing to block the others attacks. This went on for several minutes before you hit him with an uppercut and kicked him off the platform and he began to plummet, but when he passed the last platform he could use, he was forced to the spectator platform, Esdeath applauding you. “Well done Sasuke. Very well done. Now I wish to test your strength. But I say we all rest fist.” “Agreed, Captain!” “Works for me.” “Yes.” You smiled and you nodded. You opened the way home and you all went to rest.
11411111111111.title: The Perfect Sword

114111111111111.content:
As everyone else took a breather, you decided to go outside and enjoy the evening sky. Even with the problems in the Capital, you were still able to enjoy yourself with moments like this. “Enjoying the night?” she said breaking the silence and sitting beside you. “Yeah. I guess I am. Though I enjoyed that night on the beach more to be honest.” Esdeath chuckled a little. “I enjoyed that too.” Both of you sat next to each other, just enjoying the company the other provides. “You sure you wish to battle against me? Even in that dimension of yours?” “I’m sure. It’s the only way I can test my strength. You are the only one I could train against to push me to the limits.” “I see. I will put your strength to the test Sasuke. But as you don’t want me to hold back, you better not hold back on me.” “I know better than to do that. You are the Capital’s strongest after all.” She smiled and moved a little closer to you. This time, you stayed right where you were. You felt like you were getting closer to her than anyone else in years. Later on that night, Bols had worked with Wave to make a great meal once again, and you all began to bond as a unit. You even developed some strategies with multiple team members, creating combination attacks, and discussing how they would be implemented. You even took Coro’s regeneration, speed, and power into account so you could be even more in synch as a unit. “I can’t guarantee this tactic will leave Coro unscathed you know. At the absolute least, he’s gonna get a hole through his torso.” “Coro can handle it. Right, Coro?” Coro responded eagerly and you smiled. Esdeath was just observing all this and became extremely impressed by your tactical expertise. You knew that they may end up fighting Night Raid with these tactics, but for the moment you focused on your upcoming brawl with Esdeath. You knew ice would be absolutely useless against her, and just because you had fire on your side, it was FAR from being the edge that could secure victory. You haven’t even seen the full extent of her strength. But you have held back around her as well. So one thing was for sure, the team would soon see a brawl between two titans of battle.


After a few hours everyone had decided to rest, you sleeping with Esdeath once again. However, your dreams had started to become nightmares. You were in a dark void for a bit, before you saw your team all around you, brutally killed and their blood everywhere. You had started to panic, and you saw flashes of the battle that killed them all, a voice echoed throughout the entire area. As if targeting your sanity, the voice continued to haunt you. “You will lose everything…again…” You tried to block it out, covering your ears. “You cannot save them…they will die…and your will to go on shall be destroyed…” “Shut up…shut up!” “You are weak….you deserve to be alone…” You began to cry out in anguish before waking up in a cold sweat, panting heavily and shaking like a leaf. Esdeath was awake with a worried look on her face. “Sasuke, are you okay? You’re trembling.” You tried to catch your breath. “I-I’m alright…j-just a nightmare.” Esdeath wrapped her arms around you, and you felt your world calm down. “It’s alright Sasuke. I’m here now.” You were amazed at how calm you were able to get so quickly. Considering not 15 seconds ago you were in a height of fear. “Try to rest Sasuke. I’m here for you.” she said lying down beside you. You followed suit and let her embrace you again, and it didn’t take long for you to fall asleep again, and for the rest of the night you were able to sleep peacefully.

The next day, after a lovely breakfast with your team, you reopened the Chaos Dimension and as the rest of the Jaegers sat on the sidelines, you and Esdeath stood in front of each other and slowly drawing your blades, your sharingan ablaze in your eyes. “Are you ready, Sasuke?” “Ready when you are, Esdeath.” The team watched with great interest, knowing the battle was about to begin.
114111111111111.title: A Small Reprieve

1141111111111111.content: Without wasting a beat, the two of you charged at each other and your swords began to clash. Sparks started flying really quickly as neither of you pulled any punches in this fight. Matching each other beat for beat for a little while before Esdeath forced you back with multiple ice spikes. Jumping backward to avoid it, you retaliated with smaller fireballs, Esdeath either dodging them or using her sword to slice them. “Not bad. But I’m not done yet.” you said as you used wind to propel yourself forward like a bullet, and took a swing at Esdeath, she managed to dodge the attack by leaning back, returning your attack with her ice shards. The only reason you didn’t take a hit was because you started to spin in the air, one of them even grazing your cheek. You landed on a platform, sliding to a stop and let out a sigh of relief. “Talk about a close shave.” Esdeath created that giant pillar of ice like she did on the island, a great number of ice shards aimed right at you. “Take this, Weiss Schnabel!” she said firing them out at you. “Not so fast!” You inhaled deeply and let out a pure torrent of flame, her attacks completely evaporating, and even hitting the tower. But like she did on the island, she just snapped her fingers and a giant ball of ice began to plummet toward you. “Hagel Sprung!” You used your Chidori and jumped toward the massive sphere of ice. It took a lot of power on your part, but you managed to drill right through it and get right up to her, your sword meeting once again. But she didn’t waste time in separating you two and kicked you in the side, sending you toward another platform, you had to stick your sword into the ground to slow down. “This is getting exciting!” you said charging in. Firing off multiple bolts of lightning, you were able to force her back for once, noticing the same grin on her face as your own. “You know Esdeath, I must admit that you may be the only one who could make a battle this fun for me.” She laughed a little in response. “I must admit I’m entertained, but I’m far from finished Sasuke.” “That goes double for me.” Esdeath immediately came out and with a kick she sent more ice your way, and you returned the attack using Earth in a similar fashion, the two attacks canceling each other out. As the two of you fought, the others were in pure awe of this whole thing. “Sasuke is so strong to be able to keep up with the Captain!” “Yeah, but remember, they haven’t even started to get serious.” Esdeath created a second sword of ice and slashed at you in an unrelenting assault. You were able to get a gap between you and using the power of darkness, your shadow created sharp tendrils and fired toward her, and she jumped back slashing at them at the same time. You were able to get above her and fire off projectiles of compressed wind at her. She used the ice to create a sort of cage to block them off, and while it did do just that, they were weakened enough to slice right through. However, rushing in like that almost cost you the fight, as Esdeath about forced her sword through your head, just BARELY dodging, even getting a cut on your cheek. Sliding back on the ground you decided to try something new. Running your hand along the blade, energy began to flow all around the blade. “Try this one on for size. Crimson Thunder!” With one swing of your sword, a massive force wave fired toward her, sparking with the same red electricity as your sword. She created a wall of ice to stop it, but your attack not only shattered it, but sent her back big time, all with the sound of a thunderclap as well. The others were AMAZED to see this. As Esdeath landed on her feet, she began to chuckle a little, before letting out a burst of laughter. “Sasuke, you truly are my destiny. It’s been so long since I was hit by an opponent. I have to commend you for that.” That sadistic grin appeared on her face. That attack may have landed a hit, but it did require a great deal of energy from you. “I’m glad I can amuse you. Don’t tell me you’re done!” you said charging in, she did the same and as your blades locked, she looked you dead in the eye. “Not at all. Show me what you can do!” she said landing a kick to your stomach with her heel, and you were in plenty of pain from that. This battle went on for well over an hour. The two of you matching each other perfectly. The others didn’t avert their eyes for even a second. To them, this was a once in a lifetime battle. Both of you getting some hits in here and there, Your clothes were getting pretty damn torn up in the process. “You may need a new outfit after this fight Sasuke.” she said with a laugh. “Yeah, I can see that happening.” you said laughing as well. You decided to up the ante by breaking flames onto your sword before leaping towards her. You started to lean into her and she was forced back, but she didn’t exactly stop her assault either. In fact, she did manage to knock the blade out of your hands before freezing you solid. The others gasped at the sight of this. “Is it over?” “I don’t think so. Watch.” Esdeath jumped onto a different platform in a hurry, and the others quickly found out why. The ice around you began to glow red and in an instant a MASSIVE amount of flames came bursting from it, the flames firing out in such a way it was crazy. Esdeath was obviously able to dodge the flames, but it took a good amount of effort on her part. She turned her gaze toward you and saw you were panting heavily, your shirt just destroyed. Ripping it off, being it was pretty pointless to keep the shreds of a shirt on, you grabbed your blade and looked at her. “I am extremely impressed Esdeath, you are the first to force me to use my Wildfire Tsunami technique. I wont be able to continue for much longer. So lets have one more go!” you said taking a stance. “Alright then.” she said as she took a stance too, her sword pointing right at you. You sent a great deal of energy to your legs and you leaped toward her at great speed, to the point it surprised Esdeath. Just before you landed a blow, she smirked as she tried to dodge. “Makahadoma!” In that moment time had stopped around her, and she sidestepped your attack. And when she allowed things to move normally, she landed a blow that if it were outside this dimension, I would have killed you. You looked up at her as you collapsed form exhaustion. “H-How did you…?” “I developed that technique so you couldn’t run away from me. I may only be able to use it once a day, but it still useful.” You laughed as you were all returned home, still laying on your back exhausted. “Y-You truly are an amazing woman.” She helps you up and gets you inside, and you were smiling the entire time from that battle.
1141111111111111.title: Clash of Titans

choices: Imperial Arms (1) (I'd like this one if i may)
12.content: Which storyline will you make?
12.title: Akame

122.content:
Stand at 5’8, with Snow White hair and shiny light blue eyes, you hold the imperial arm: Ronin

Ronin (yes I made this one up, thought it would be more fun to write on):

A sword capable of taking the soul of the one slain by it. The sword appears to be thin and quite light; however, for every soul these swords take, the strength and abilities of the sword increase. This may lead to believe that soul sealing is not the only swords capabilities. This imperial arm is not ordinary though. Only a user that is accepted and trusted by the sword can wield them. In history, those who’ve attempted to steal these swords have felt a series of pain and quite often death.

As of for you, for some reason, you can’t quite remember too much about yourself. About 2 years ago, you woke up in grassy field with no memory about your past. All you had were the clothes on your body and your robin sword.

You’ve spent the past 2 years trying to learn about who you are. Along the path you’ve learned or perhaps relearned details and capabilities about yourself and the “Ronin” Imperial arm. And continued through life with out a real name. However, through the deeds you have committed, rumors hold you to the name of “Ronin”, but that is not a name you have cared to accept because that already belonged to your sword.
122.title: Imperial Arms (2)

1221.content:
Late at night, you were walking in the slums of the capital. Here was the location of the capitals underground dark market. There they sold items that cannot be bought in the city. You hoped to find a book that spoke more about your past or about your sword to hopefully discover your own origin.

When you woke up 2 years ago, you remember this sword lying next to you, and the sword seemed to have a very close relationship with you. Perhaps this swords clings onto the past you can’t remember.

Right above you, you notice 3 shadows jumping from roof top to roof top. You don’t normally let suspicions like this just go over your head. In curiosity, you jump onto one of the roof tops to get a better view of the shadows.

After landing on the roof, you scout for the shadows in the general direction they were heading. You notice the three shadows you were first saw and two more moving along side them. They were headed toward this mansion off to the side of the slums.
1221.title: Continue (slow paste story)

choices: Question why they have imperial arms
12211.content:
You quickly follow they’re movement far and quietly behind so they don’t sense you.

As you finally make it to the mansion, you heard several glass windows shattering. “Please, don’t kill me. I’ll give whatever you want. Gold, money, riches” a man weeps. This sound is familiar, it’s the sound of someone trying to run away from death. “Please, we won’t need anything from scum like you. All of your wealth is blood money” you hear a women yell. “You won’t get away with this. That’s right. Night raid, that’s what they call you. The capital will-“

The mans voice silenced by the sound of a sword. You heard his body hit the ground and then silence filled the air. “Well, I guess our job is done here” you heard a female voice. “Ah, sure is” a man with a deep voice replied. “Wow, you guys were quick, I didn’t even get to use my imperial arm” you heard a female with a high pitch voice say.

“What, imperial arms” you think to yourself. Those words alone was enough to have you react.

“What’s that” the female voice from before says. “It’s over there” a young male voice responds pointing in your direction.

You landed, in the shadow of the house. Standing before you were seven people. Three men one with black hair, the other with brown hair, and the other with green hair. Then there were four females: one with blonde hair who looked similar to a cat, a girl with pink hair holding a gun, a girl with light purple hair holding scissors, and girl with black hair and red eyes with a sword on her side. All they could see from you was a shadow. “Who are you” the girl with pink hair asks. You stayed silent and didn’t respond. “Ehh, a silent one, you shouldn’t get involved, I suggest you just stay out” the girl with blonde hair spoke.

“Imperial arms” you said to them. “What” the girl with blonde hair responded. “You said imperial arms” you responded. “Look we already told you once to not get involved, you’re better off leaving” the blonde haired girl responded. You remains silent and didn’t say another word. If these people possess imperial arms, they may know a thing or two about yours.

“That’s it, I’ve had enough with this” the blonde haired girl said, moving into a fighting stance. “Wait Leone, we don’t know anything about him” the man with brown hair said. “True, but the shear chance he’s with the capital is possible” the girl with black hair responded. “Ugh, well, if he doesn’t leave in the next second, we have no choice” the blonde haired girl replied.
12211.title: Follow them

122111.content:
You stood still and didn’t move a muscle.
