“That’s it, I’m making the move” the blonde girl said then began charging toward you. “Leone wait” the girl with black girl yelled. “No chance, if we leave now he might follow us” the girl named Leone yelled. “Raaaa” she screamed preparing her first move against you.

However, her punched miss.

You quickly jumped and dodge her attack. Her punch ended up flying into the wall that was behind you, making a complete big hole in the house. When you landed, you were right in front of the broken windows of the house. The lights within the house were lit, and shined onto to you, revealing yourself to them.

Everyone seemed to be in a fight position with all of their weapons. They all seemed to have a unique weapon. “So that’s what you look like” the girl with pink haired asked. “So are we fighting this guy” the boy with green hair asked. “Wait” the girl with black hair commanded. “Akame, what’s the matter” the man with brown hair asked. “Your sword, it doesn’t look ordinary, but I don’t recognize you, and your clothes don’t make you look like an ordinary capita soldier. Are you a Jaeger” the black haired girl asked.

Judging by how they address each other, the blonde haired girl who attacked you must be named Leone, and the with black hair, Akame.

“Unfortunately, I don’t think I know who you speak of. I came to question why guys hold imperial arms. And who exactly are you all” you asked. “Well now he starts talking” the girl with pink haired commented.

“He doesn’t know who we are” the man with brown hair asked. “That seems a little hard to believe, our pictures are posted everywhere around here” the pink haired girl said. The female Leone came back and rejoined with her group. “So your not with the capital’s army” the girl named Akame asked. You turned your attention to her “No. I’m not” you replied.

“So do we stand down” the man with black hair asked. “Keep your guard up, we don’t know if we can trust him or not, especially with a weapon like that” Akame replied.

The weapon Ronin, when in its shaft, appears in a black sheath, with guard that is all black with a blue outline and white kanji characters, and an all black handle.

“I don’t intend to pull my weapon, if you choose not to fight” you said, moving you hands up in the air. “Then what is that you want” Akame asked. “I more so wish to know why you all wield imperial arms” you asked. “Were night raid, a rebellion, we all each have our own weapon, to support our cause” Akame responded. “Then what exactly is your cause” you asked. “Peace” she replied.

“Peace” you asked. “Yes” she replied. “Yet, you do it through bloodshed” you commented. “The bloodshed we commit are on those corrupting this place” she replied to your comment.

“I don’t know enough about this place or about your goals to understand your reasons, so I have no side” you replied. “Then would you join us” Akame asked. “Akame” Leone questioned her in shock. “Can we even trust him” the man with black hair asked. “I don’t know, but he would be better off with us then them” she replied.
122111.title: The first approach

1221112.content:
“No” you answered.

“Ehhh” Leone’s expression was confused. “I understand” Akame replied, she said doing a slight bow. Everyone else then turned around and prepared to leave.

“However” you added. They all turned back toward you with a confused expression. “I would like to come along with you all” you said. “What, how is that suppose to work” the girl with pink haired asked. “Look, we don’t exactly have all the time in the world to talk” the man with green hair added. “Then what is it that you want” Akame asked.

“I don’t understand enough about your cause to support it; however, I believe that following you all, may answer some of my questions” you answered. “Hmm” Akame looked toward the ground in deep thought.

“Can we just do that” the man with brown hair asked. “I guess we could, we did with you, except somewhat against your will” Leone replied. “Yeah that’s right you did, I remember you dragging me” the brown haired man yelled back. “Okay okay, calm down. Look, our hideout is kept top secret, it’s not as easy as you think just bringing you along just to answer a couple questions” Leone replied.

“Fine” Akame said answering your question from before.

“What, Akame? Are you sure” Leone asked. “If answers are what he wants, and not a fight. Then perhaps Najenda may have some answers for him” Akame replied. “Okay sure, but how do we know we can trust him” the green haired man asked. “Pure” Akame replied. “What was that Akame” Leone asked. “Somewhere in my gut I know” she replied.

“Well, you seem to have a bit of trust for him. I guess we can” the green haired boy replied. M
1221112.title: Off with Night Raid

12211121.content:
The run with Night Raid toward they’re hide out was long run. You were impressed by the distances they would take just to complete a mission.

“Stop” Akame said, halting everyone’s movement. You were still in the middle of the forest, with no hideout insight. You had a concerned and confused look on your face. “Unfortunately, this is the furthest I can bring you” Akame replied. “I thought this was going to happen, an outsider is not just welcomed into our hideout, unless they wish to join us otherwise you would be stuck working in a workshop for the revolutionary army” the girl with pink haired respond. “So what will happen now” you asked.

“Are you sure you don’t wish you join us or the revolutionary army” Akame asked. Everyone looked at you with a concerned expression on they’re face. “I wish I could help you all achieve your goal of peace; however, I have my own agenda and goals” you respond. “That’s too bad, you may have been promising” Leone commented.

“Everyone” a voice came from the trees on the side. Slowly a shadow appeared and a lady with white hair and a metal arm came out from the leaves.

“Boss” everyone said in excitement. Her eyes were drawn toward you and a shocked expression came from her faced but quickly went back to a serious look.

“What are you doing our here” the pink haired girl asked. “I had just received new information about an incident in the capital, whose this” she asked referring to you. “We met him after we completed our mission tonight, he had questions about our imperial arms, and thought he could get answers for his on question if he came with us” the boy with brown haired responded. “Does he wish to join us” she asked. “Ugh, unfortunately no, so this is as far as we could bring him” Leone responded. “Tough luck, seems like you wasted his time; however” she exclaimed. “But what” the brown haired boy asked.

“That sword of yours, it’s unique isn’t it” she asked you. “Akame had the same thought” Leone added. “I’ve heard that once before” you responded. “If you don’t mind, it looks like an imperial arm I once read about” she said. “What an imperial arms user” the brown haired boy said in shock. “Boss, how can you tell” Akame asked. “Just by the pattern on the guard of the sword” she explained.

“That may be true, but also wrong at the same time” you responded. “What” the brown haired boy said in confusion. “Yes I know, the sword that’s on your waste is suppose to be Ronin, ain’t it, but it’s not” she said. “You’re quite sharp Boss-sama” you responded. “What’s this Ronin” Leone asked.

“Ronin is an imperial arms just like yours; however, it hasn't been seen that much throughout history, and very few were known to be able to wield. Often times, people who attempted to wield the sword for its power, had been killed by the sword itself” she explained. “That’s quite accurate” you responded. “For you too know about the sword, and to hold a fake that looks quite like it, must mean you know something about it, so why did you come here” she asked.

You stayed silent for a moment, and saw all the concerned looks on everyone’s faces. “Fine, I guess I should talk. About two years ago, I woke up with no memory; however, I believe that the sword Ronin has something to do with my own history, which why I wish to travel to are learn more about myself, if any information still exists” you answered. “So that’s why he knew nothing about the capital or us” Leone responded.

“So you do possess the imperial arms don’t you” she asked. “Boss, how did you know that sword on his waist was a fake” Akame asked. “Because the sword Ronin cannot be contained in an artificial sheath. After all, Ronin does mean, a samurai with no master. Which also means that if you have possession of that sword, then you must be the myth named Ronin itself” she said. You remained silent and did not say a word. “Well, is that true” she asked. “Perhaps” you responded.

“Look, if you don’t want to be direct, then let me offer you this. I do have books that mention the sword, but unfortunately I can’t just hand them to you” she said. “Because I don’t wish to join the Night Raid” you asked. “Exactly right; however if you do wish to join, the books would be all yours to read. The decision requires commitment” she responded. “Tough choice” you commented. “Perhaps you joining us may lead to history you wish to learn about, you never know” she added.

You thought about it for a brief moment.
12211121.title: Meeting the boss

122111211.content:
You thought hard about your decision, and finally made a conclusion.

“Fine, then I will join your cause” you responded. Everyone’s expression became shocked by your answer. “However, I would like to see your skills before you wish to join” the boss responded. “A test” you asked. “Sure, like a test. And if you fail, you will not be allowed to join us” she concluded.

“But boss-” Leone questioned. “I’ll accept” you responded with determination and calmness. “The test I offer you, will be to face members already in Night Raid” she said. “I understand” you responded. “So who would like to go first” she asked, looking at her team.
122111211.title: The Test

1221112111.content:
“I will” Akame said. “Akame” the boss questioned her decision. “Boss, it would only make sense if she fought, since she was that one that saw potential in him” Leone replied to the boss’s confused look. “Okay, fine with me” the boss replied.

Both of you stepped forward and faced each other. Akame got into a fighting stance placing her hand onto her sword, ready to draw it. You stood there in place with your hands on your side not moving a muscle.

“He seems a little cocky, not getting into a fighting stance, he’ll regret it” the girl with pink haired said. You didn’t let her sly comment bother you; however, that gave you a hint on how skillful with Akame is.

“Fight” the boss announced commencing the fight.

In a split second, Akame drew her sword and flew straight at you with her sword pointing right at your head.

*kssht*

Everyone’s faces filled with shock. Just as fast her movement, you dodged her attack, yet stopped her movement by grabbing her blade, holding in place with your left hand. Even Akame’s faces filled with shock, almost as if she was horrified by your reaction to her attack.

“Why” she questioned. “What was he thinking, does he not know about the power behind Akame’s sword” the boy with brown haired asked.

Like the speed of light, you drew your sword with your right hand, pulling the sword upside down. Your sword followed along with your forearm, stopping the blade right in front of Akame’s neck. “Finished” you said, ending the fight as if it were a finishing blow.

“But how” you heard her team say in shock. “How is he even able to move” you heard the boy with brown hair ask.

The pain from your wound on your left hand began to sink in with immense pain. And black markings began to spread from your left arm. However, the markings stopped spreading when reached it your elbow.

“Ronin” you said and the markings began to glow to white and shattered away.

Akame gasped from what she just saw, then pulled her blade away from your hand. “What.. happened” Leone said barely even able to let words out of her mouth.

“That’s enough” the boss said. “But how did you” Akame asked.

“So it’s true then” the boss looked at you and asked. You’re attention was drawn toward the boss. “You do possess the imperial arm, Ronin” she asked. “That’s the power of Ronin” Akame asked.

“But boss, how can you tell, you said the sword he held was a fake” Leone asked. “I wasn’t wrong about that sword that he’s holding. There many mysteries about the imperial arm ‘Ronin’, not all of its capabilities are known, even in written text; however, the ability to counter another’s imperial arm in such a way, has definitely been scene” she explained.

“Ronin, why don’t you show everyone your wound” the boss asked. You wipes the blood off of your hand and presented your palm to everyone. The wound that you got from Akame’s blade was completely healed. Everyone was surprised by this. “I also know that the Ronin, is capable of healing it’s user” the boss concluded.

“Since you’ve figured out this much, I will admit, that I do possess ‘Ronin’” you admitted. “I thought just as much, that will be enough. Ronin, welcome to Night Raid” the boss announced.
1221112111.title: The Power of Ronin

12211121111.content:
“Welcome to the Night Raid Hideout” the boss said sitting in her chair. You were in the main hall of the Night Raid Hideout, where they would brief their missions.

“Allows is to introduce ourselves. My name is Najenda, and I am the leader of Night Raid, that’s why everyone refers to me as boss” Najenda said. They all began to go down the line and introduce themselves one by one.

“My name is Tatsumi” the brown hair boy said. “I’m Bulat, but you can always call me bro” the man with fancy black hair said. “Bro” you asked. “Yeah, like an older brother” he replied. “But your not my brother” you replied. Everyone had a little bit of an embarrassing look on their faces, as if they were sorry for your slight incompetence. “I think you’ll understand what I mean later, for now call me whatever you like” Bulat replied.

“My name is Lubbock” the boy with green hair said. “As you probably already know, my name is Leone” the blonde haired girl said. “My name is Mine” the girl with pink haired said, she had a little bit of a cocky attitude, but you sensed a little bit of empathy in her. “‘My name is Sheele, and it’s very nice to meet you” the girl with light purple hair said. She seemed to have a nice and kind aura around her. “I am Akame” Akame said reintroducing herself, even though both have already faced each other. You knew from just that fight, she was quite the talented swordsman nonetheless.

“This is Night Raid. Now I understand rumors have called you Ronin in the past, but do you have a real name you go by” Najenda asked. “It’s true that’s what people have called me, but I prefer not to be called that; however, my name” you said but hesitated. You realized that you have never gone by an actual name, you must’ve forgotten your name after you woke up two years ago.

“Do you have a name” Leone asked. “C’mon, everyone should at least know that” Mine added. “The truth is, everything before two years ago I can’t remember” you replied. “What, really?! What happened” Tatsumi asked. “I don’t know, all remember was waking up in a grassy field, with no memory at all” you answered. “So that’s why you are trying to find answers” Akame asked. “Yes, and all I know is the name Ronin, but that name doesn’t feel right to me as a person” you replied. “Do you have a name you’d like us to call you by” Najenda asked. You thought hard for a moment but could not come up with anything. “Sorry, but I can’t think of a name” you replied.

“Well, maybe we should give you a name, how is that” Najenda asked. “Yes, that’s okay with me” you relied. “Oooo, maybe we should name you after a heroic hero” Leone asked. “Or maybe after a legendary swordsman” Sheele added. “Well, it can’t be dumb as a name like Tatsumi” Mine commented, mocking Tatsumi. “What did you say, I think my name is great” Tatsumi rambled. “Yeah, yeah. Of course you would say that” Mine replies, giving Tatsumi a cold shoulder. “Don’t worry Tatsumi, I think you’re name is great” Bulat replied, giving Tatsumi a friendly grin and a wink. “Bro, why’d you have to say like that” Tatsumi replies, slowly sliding away from Bulat.

“I think Yuki would be a nice name” Akame said. “Oooo, that would be nice, fits him perfectly” Leone responded. “Yuki does sound like a nice name” Najenda added. “Yeah it matches your hair and your eyes” Tatsumi said getting a good look at your facial features.

“How does that sound” Najenda asked.
